item.title: 中国农历新年假期期间的旅游支出超过了疫情前的水平
item.description: Tourism revenues in China during the eight-day Lunar New Year holidays that ended on Saturday surged by 47.3% year-on-year thanks to a domestic travel boom, surpassing pre-COVID 2019 levels, official data showed on Sunday.翻译:官方数据周日显​​示，由于国内旅游热潮，在周六结束的为期八天的农历新年假期期间，中国的旅游收入同比猛增 47.3%，超过了 2019 年新冠疫情之前的水平。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国首架国产客机在新加坡国际首秀
item.description: China's challenger to Airbus and Boeing's passenger jets, the narrow-body C919 manufactured by the Commercial Aircraft Corporation of China (COMAC), has made its first trip outside Chinese territory, staging a fly-by at the Singapore Airshow on Sunday.翻译:中国对空客和波音客机的挑战者、由中国商用飞机有限责任公司（COMAC）制造的窄体C919飞机周日在新加坡航展上进行了首次飞越中国领土的飞行。
item.author: Lisa Barrington

item.title: 美联储阴影下中国银行维持关键政策利率不变
item.description: China's central bank left a key policy rate unchanged as expected on Sunday when rolling over maturing medium-term loans, with uncertainties around the timing of an easing by the Federal Reserve limiting Beijing's room to manoeuvre on monetary policy.翻译:中国央行周日在到期中期贷款展期时如预期维持关键政策利率不变，美联储宽松时机的不确定性限制了北京方面的货币政策操作空间。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着台湾岛屿紧张局势升级，中国将派遣海警船
item.description: China's coast guard said on Sunday it will strengthen its law enforcement activities and carry out regular patrols around a small group of Taiwanese-controlled islands off the Chinese coast as tensions rise over the deaths of two Chinese nationals.翻译:中国海警周日表示，随着两名中国公民死亡导致紧张局势升级，将加强执法活动，并在中国沿海一小群台湾控制的岛屿周围进行定期巡逻。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 乌克兰外长与中国王毅讨论和平前景
item.description: Ukrainian Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba said on Saturday he had discussed the prospects for peace in Kyiv's nearly two-year-old war against Russia with his Chinese counterpart, part of a long-running bid to bolster relations with Beijing.翻译:乌克兰外长德米特罗·库莱巴周六表示，他已与中国外长讨论了基辅与俄罗斯近两年战争的和平前景，这是加强与北京关系的长期努力的一部分。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国外长在慕尼黑安全会议上警告不要脱钩
item.description: Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi warned the West that it would be making a historical mistake if it sought to decouple from China in the interests of reducing risk.翻译:中国外长王毅警告西方，如果为了降低风险而寻求与中国脱钩，将犯历史性错误。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，中国恒大的清算人准备就审计问题起诉普华永道
item.description: The liquidators of property developer China Evergrande are preparing for a potential lawsuit against its auditor PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC), the Financial Times reported on Saturday, citing people with knowledge of the conversations.翻译:英国《金融时报》周六援引知情人士的话报道称，房地产开发商中国恒大的清算人正在准备对其审计师普华永道（PwC）提起潜在诉讼。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国王毅告诉布林肯 美国应该取消对中国企业的制裁
item.description: Washington should lift sanctions on Chinese companies and individuals, and that attempts to de-couple from China would only hurt the United States, China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi told U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken.翻译:中国外交部长王毅对美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯表示，华盛顿应该取消对中国企业和个人的制裁，与中国脱钩的企图只会伤害美国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英国卡梅伦向中国外长提出红海和人权问题
item.description: British Foreign Minister David Cameron met his Chinese counterpart Wang Yi at the Munich Security Conference on Friday, the UK Foreign Office said in a statement.翻译:英国外交部在一份声明中表示，英国外交大臣戴维·卡梅伦周五在慕尼黑安全会议上会见了中国外交部长王毅。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 着眼于中国，美国高级议员誓言支持为太平洋岛屿提供资金
item.description: The Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Foreign Affairs Committee said on Friday he supported funding for U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations as a way to counter the influence of China, and would push to include them in any supplemental security aid bill.翻译:美国众议院外交事务委员会共和党主席周五表示，他支持向美国盟友太平洋岛国提供资金，以此作为对抗中国影响力的一种方式，并将推动将其纳入任何补充安全援助法案。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 意大利监管机构迫使 TikTok 删除“法国疤痕”挑战视频
item.description: Italy's communications authority AGCOM on Friday said it had forced social media app TikTok to remove some videos showing young people performing a dangerous practice known as the "French scar".翻译:意大利通讯当局 AGCOM 周五表示，已迫使社交媒体应用 TikTok 删除一些显示年轻人进行被称为“法国疤痕”的危险行为的视频。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大众汽车1月份在中国的交付量增长13%
item.description: Volkswagen on Friday said group deliveries rose 13.3% in January to 698,200 vehicles, with China the leading growth region.翻译:大众汽车周五表示，1 月份集团销量增长 13.3%，达到 698,200 辆，其中中国是增长最快的地区。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：汇丰银行将改善与香港恒生银行的关系以降低风险
item.description: HSBC plans to tighten risk management at Hong Kong unit Hang Seng Bank due to worries about a potential rise in bad loans amid growing economic headwinds and property sector crisis in China, said two people with knowledge of the matter.翻译:两位知情人士表示，由于担心中国经济逆风加剧和房地产业危机可能导致不良贷款增加，汇丰银行计划加强香港子公司恒生银行的风险管理。
item.author: Sumeet Chatterjee, Engen Tham, Selena Li

item.title: 中国加强房地产行业“白名单”机制 - 媒体
item.description: Five state-owned Chinese banks have been matched with more than 8,200 residential projects for development loans under the "whitelist" mechanism aimed at injecting liquidity into the crisis-hit sector, government-backed media The Paper reported.翻译:据政府支持的媒体澎湃新闻报道，中国五家国有银行已在“白名单”机制下为超过8,200个住宅项目提供开发贷款，旨在为受危机打击的行业注入流动性。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 供应紧张之际，中国将在新加坡航展上展示国产客机
item.description: Singapore will play host to Asia's biggest air show next week for the first time since the end of COVID border restrictions, with regional travel rebounding and the military side of the show bristling with defensive systems and nervous arms buyers.翻译:新加坡将于下周举办自新冠疫情边境限制结束以来首次举办亚洲最大的航空展，地区旅行将出现反弹，展会的军事方面将布满防御系统和紧张的武器买家。
item.author: Lisa Barrington, Tim Hepher

item.title: 香港当局在价值18亿美元的洗钱案中逮捕了七人
item.description: Hong Kong authorities said on Friday they had arrested seven people suspected of being involved in a $1.8 billion money laundering case, the largest ever in the financial hub.翻译:香港当局周五表示，他们逮捕了 7 名涉嫌参与 18 亿美元洗钱案件的人，这是该金融中心有史以来规模最大的洗钱案件。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 澳大利亚葡萄酒制造商押注中国有望重新开放，并向香港大量发货
item.description: Australian wine makers have shipped millions of bottles of wine to Hong Kong in a bet that China will soon lift tariffs on Australian wine and revive a trade worth hundreds of millions of dollars, according to industry figures and trade data.翻译:根据行业数据和贸易数据，澳大利亚葡萄酒制造商已将数百万瓶葡萄酒运往香港，押注中国将很快取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒的关税并重振价值数亿美元的贸易。
item.author: Peter Hobson, Lewis Jackson

item.title: 太平洋岛国对美国拖延资助感到担忧，对中国发出警告
item.description: Leaders of strategic U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations have become increasingly anxious about the U.S. congressional budget impasse that has delayed approval of vital new funding packages and warned that China is actively seeking to shift their allegiances, including over Taiwan.翻译:美国的战略盟友太平洋岛国领导人对美国国会预算僵局越来越感到焦虑，这一僵局导致重要的新融资方案的批准被推迟，并警告说，中国正在积极寻求改变他们的忠诚度，包括对台湾的忠诚度。
item.author: David Brunnstrom

item.title: 独家：卢比奥敦促 SEC 阻止 Shein IPO，除非披露中国运营风险
item.description: Republican Senator Marco Rubio asked the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to block Shein’s bid to list publicly in New York unless the e-tailer makes additional disclosures about its business operations and "the serious risks of doing business" in China.翻译:共和党参议员马可·卢比奥 (Marco Rubio) 要求美国证券交易委员会阻止 Shein 在纽约公开上市的计划，除非这家电子零售商进一步披露其业务运营以及在中国“开展业务的严重风险”。
item.author: Katherine Masters

item.title: 随着中国竞争的加剧，欧洲和美国汽车制造商竞相降低电动汽车成本
item.description: Under pressure from Chinese competitors, major U.S. and European auto manufacturers are pushing hard to cut electric vehicle costs so they can have price tags and profit margins similar to those of fossil-fuel models, industry executives said on Thursday.翻译:行业高管周四表示，在中国竞争对手的压力下，美国和欧洲主要汽车制造商正在大力削减电动汽车成本，以便获得与化石燃料车型相似的价格标签和利润率。
item.author: Nick Carey, Gilles Guillaume, Joseph White
